Package managers

Class Driver

java.lang.Object
managers.Driver
public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
The main part of the program to load, create, search, and process books
Version:
June, 1, 2021
Author:
Liam, Robyn, Benson, Mike

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Driver()
    Constructs the Driver, loads the array, displays the menu for the customer to interact with

    • showBookType

      public void showBookType​(int typeOfBook)
      The purpose of this method will be to process user input, search for book types and display.
      Parameters:
      typeOfBook - 1 for childernsBook, 2 for cookBook, 3 for paperback, 4 for Periodic

    • showBookType

      public void showBookType​(int typeOfBook, char freqSelected)
      The purpose of this method will be to process user input, search for book type 4 and display.
      Parameters:
      typeOfBook - Integer being 4 for Periodic
      freqSelected - Char D, W, M, B, Q

    • checkOutBook

      public void checkOutBook​(java.lang.String isbn)
      This method takes a string ISBN, checks if the book exists, then either checks it out or displays an error message depending on availability
      Parameters:
      isbn - A string representing the isbn number of a book

    • findBookTitle

      public void findBookTitle​(java.lang.String title)
      This method will prompt the user to enter a title. It is case-insensitive. Will display books in table form.
      Parameters:
      title - name to search bookList with.

    • produceRandomBookList

      public void produceRandomBookList​(int numOfBooks)
      Method will grab x random books from user and display random books.
      Parameters:
      numOfbooks - this will take in the number of books from user.
